projects.text: s/ Libraries: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, FastAPI, Spring Boot, Flask, Next.js, Bootstrap, Scikit-learn, Numpy, Pandas, Pygame, graphics.h Tools: VS Code, Eclipse, IntelliJ, Git, GitHub, MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Docker, Postman, ThunderClient, NGINX ,Selenium PROJECTS House Rental App (MERN + Flask + ML): Nov 2024 – Mar 2025 Engineered platform with real-time chat, notifications,maps, rent prediction (XGBoost). Built secure APIs and a dynamic React frontend. Graph Algorithm Visualizer (C/C++):August 2023 – December 2023 illustrated BFS, DFS, Dijkstra, Floyed-Warshall , Bellman Ford etc., with interactive graphics for both user inputs and file inputs. Gomoku AI Game (Pygame) :May 2025 Implemented the Gomoku game (5 in a row) for a 10x10 board that supports player vs. AI mode. Developed and optimized an evaluation function for the Gomoku AI that plays reasonably well maintaining time efficiency. The program uses a minimax algorithm with alpha beta pruning to reduce search time. Library System (FastAPI, MongoDB, Docker): April 2025 - May 2025 Built scalable microservice app using nginx. Garments Inventory(Spring Boot+PostgreSql) May 2025 -Developed maintaining a clean architectural system. DUDS Management SRS: Jan 2024 – June 2024 Led the Software Requirements Specification design for the DUDS Management System, a comprehensive internal management application.
